data.comment: The big names in today's match at Ramon Sanchez Pizjuan have now been confirmed.
Today's referee, Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez, has blown to start the match.
In the minute 1, Sevilla's Munir El Haddadi is back in action after a slight knock.
Ball safe as Real Madrid is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Vinicius Junior for Real Madrid gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 2, Goal kick for Sevilla at Ramon Sanchez Pizjuan.
Sevilla have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Sevilla in the half of Real Madrid.
In the minute 6, Throw-in for Real Madrid in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Real Madrid goal kick.
Sevilla have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 10, Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez awards the away team a throw-in.
Real Madrid awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Real Madrid to take a throw-in in Sevilla territory.
In the minute 12, Throw-in Sevilla.
Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez signals a free kick to Sevilla in their own half.
Free kick in a good position for Real Madrid!
In the minute 16, In Seville a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Real Madrid in their own half.
Can Sevilla get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Real Madrid's half?
In the minute 19, Real Madrid awarded a free kick in their own half.
Real Madrid's Toni Kroos gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez awards Sevilla a goal kick.
In the minute 23, Real Madrid awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Seville.
Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez signals a Real Madrid throw-in in Sevilla's half.
In the minute 27, Real Madrid have been awarded a corner by Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez.
Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez signals a free kick to Real Madrid in their own half.
Throw-in for Sevilla at Ramon Sanchez Pizjuan.
In the minute 31, Goal kick for Sevilla at Ramon Sanchez Pizjuan.
Free kick for Sevilla in the half of Real Madrid.
In Seville, Sevilla push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 35, Sevilla drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Throw-in for Real Madrid in their own half.
Free kick for Real Madrid in their own half.
In the minute 38, Real Madrid's Karim Benzema gets in a shot on goal at Ramon Sanchez Pizjuan. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Real Madrid.
Raphael Varane (Real Madrid) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Sevilla defenders.
In the minute 39, Sevilla's Luuk De Jong breaks free at Ramon Sanchez Pizjuan. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Seville.
Sevilla awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 42, Sevilla have been awarded a corner by Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez signals a free kick to Sevilla in their own half.
In the minute 44, Toni Kroos for Real Madrid has been booked by Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez and receives a first yellow card.
Corner awarded to Sevilla.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Seville.
In the minute 45, Can Sevilla get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Real Madrid's half?
Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
Munir El Haddadi is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
The second-half is underway in Seville.
The home team have replaced Munir El Haddadi with Oliver Torres. This is the first substitution made today by Julen Lopetegui.
In the minute 47, Throw-in Real Madrid.
Throw-in for Real Madrid at Ramon Sanchez Pizjuan.
Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez signals a free kick to Real Madrid.
In the minute 52, Luuk De Jong for Sevilla drives towards goal at Ramon Sanchez Pizjuan. But the finish is unsuccessful.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Sevilla is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Yassine Bounou.
In the minute 55, Great play from Ferland Mendy to set up the goal.
Sevilla have a goal kick.
In the minute 58, Free kick Sevilla.
Free kick Sevilla.
Luka Modric (Real Madrid) has received a yellow card from Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez.
In the minute 61, Ivan Rakitic (Sevilla) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Can Real Madrid capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In Seville, Nacho (Real Madrid) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 63, Ball goes out of play for a Sevilla goal kick.
Nemanja Gudelj is on a sub for Joan Jordan for Sevilla.
Julen Lopetegui is making the team's third substitution at Ramon Sanchez Pizjuan with Suso replacing Luuk De Jong.
In the minute 64, Julen Lopetegui (Sevilla) is making a fourth substitution, with Youssef En-Nesyri replacing Ivan Rakitic.
Sevilla's Suso misses with an attempt on goal.
Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez awards Real Madrid a goal kick.
In the minute 66, Marco Asensio is replacing Rodrygo for Real Madrid at Ramon Sanchez Pizjuan.
Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez signals a free kick to Sevilla.
Sevilla are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 70, Free kick for Sevilla in their own half.
Free kick for Sevilla in their own half.
Throw-in for Sevilla close to the penalty box.
In the minute 74, Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez signals a free kick to Sevilla just outside Real Madrid's area.
Real Madrid will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Sevilla.
In Seville Sevilla attack through Nemanja Gudelj. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 76, Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez awards Real Madrid a goal kick.
Free kick for Real Madrid in the half of Sevilla.
Nemanja Gudelj (Sevilla) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 77, Real Madrid awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Sevilla are pushing forward but Suso's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Seville.
In the minute 80, The home team have replaced Diego Carlos with Oussama Idrissi. This is the fifth substitution made today by Julen Lopetegui.
Ball safe as Real Madrid is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Sevilla.
In the minute 85, In Seville a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Lucas Ocampos (Sevilla) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Sevilla have been awarded a corner by Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez.
In the minute 86, In Seville Sevilla drive forward through Lucas Ocampos. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to Real Madrid.
Casemiro gets his shot on target but fails to score for Real Madrid.
Real Madrid have a goal kick.
Free kick for Sevilla in the half of Real Madrid.
In the minute 89, Real Madrid's Vinicius Junior has been booked in Seville.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
Real Madrid are coming forward and Karim Benzema gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Sevilla at Ramon Sanchez Pizjuan.
Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez blows to end the match. The final score is 0-1.
